title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 225.7 - General requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 225.7 - General requirements

State Regulations

Each registered specialty retailer, permanent retailer or
temporary seasonal retailer shall prominently post for public view the
following documents at each location where such specialty retailer, permanent
retailer or temporary seasonal retailer conducts business: (a) A copy of the Office of Fire Prevention
and Control certificate of registration for such location; (b) The list, as most recently published by
the New York State Police, of counties and cities that have opted by local law
to legalize the use of sparkling devices; (c) A copy of the Federal permit, if
applicable; (d) A copy of the
insurance certificate; and
(e) A
copy of a sparkling device safety pamphlet produced by the Office of Fire

Prevention and Control. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
225.7

Adopted

New

York State Register March 23, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 12, eff. 3/23/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
